alert.note: Alert for Inland Broward County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Broward County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 13 at 3:15PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Broward and south central Palm Beach Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 315 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm near Intersection Alligator Alley And Miami Canal, or 19 miles west of Sunrise, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Coral Springs, Plantation, Sunrise, Tamarac, Lauderhill, Weston, North Lauderdale, Lauderdale Lakes, Parkland, Sawgrass Mills Mall, Intersection I-75 And U.S. 27, Mile Marker 30 On Alligator Alley, Intersection Alligator Alley And Miami Canal, East Toll Gate On Alligator Alley, Broadview-Pompano Park, Loxahatchee NWR, Markham Park and West Broward Rec. Area On Alligator Alley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Excessive cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Inland Broward County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Broward County
